metadata.name: Disabled IE Security Features
metadata.comment: Detects command lines that indicate unwanted modifications to registry keys that disable important Internet Explorer security features

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -name ieharden ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -value 0 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -name depoff ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -value 1 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -name disablefirstruncustomize ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -value 2 '))))

output.summary: Detects command lines that indicate unwanted modifications to registry keys that disable important Internet Explorer security features
